body: A master summoner's class level is halved (minimum 1) for the purposes of determining his eidolon's abilities, Hit Dice, evolution pool, and so on. The eidolon otherwise functions as normal. This ability replaces the summoner's normal eidolon ability.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Summoner Archetypes/Master Summoner/Lesser Eidolon
name: Lesser Eidolon
